article_title: Israel says four soldiers killed in rocket attack overnight.
sentence: Israel  says  four  soldiers  killed  in  rocket  attack  overnight.

article_title: Israel says four soldiers killed in rocket attack overnight.
sentence: We  reported  a  little  earlier  on  information  provided  by  the  Israeli  military  that  three  of  its  soldiers  were  killed  in  a  Hamas  rocket  attack  near  Kerem  Shalom  overnight,  one  of  the  main  crossings  used  to  deliver  aid  into  Gaza.

article_title: Israel says four soldiers killed in rocket attack overnight.
sentence: The  Israeli  Defense  Forces  (IDF)  now  says  that  a  fourth  solider  was  killed.

article_title: Israel says four soldiers killed in rocket attack overnight.
sentence: Subsequent  Israeli  strikes  in  the  southern  Gazan  city  of  Rafah  killed  at  least  19  Palestinians  overnight.
